cannotDelete: Can't delete this Reminder from the app. Please delete it manually from the default app

forReliable: For reliable alarms, please complete these steps:

disableSyncD: Turning off sync will stop reminders from syncing across your devices. Any reminders created on other devices won't appear in this app.

thanksForUsing: Thanks for using DailyCue! We would be very grateful if you can rate us.
